Hi

Is there a way to use hexadecimal (0xFFAA e.g) in NCalc?

Thanks

Ajay

I came here to say this. It seems being able to use hex '0x' and binary '0b' notation for numbers would be useful, especially since the & and | operators are supported

However trying add support for octal would be a terrible idea since no one uses it ever and it causes problems. In real life 0100 is always meant 100 decimal not 64 decimal.
